review: I love Amazon Fire Stick. It's starts the next episode of each show you are watching!!  I'm physically disabled and this really is a plus for me!!
author: Monica L. Anderson

review: Working very well,  easy to install
author: Amazon Customer

review: There are a lot of technical reviews out there so will try to keep brief. I wanted a streaming player for Netflix and Amazon prime shows and this fit the bill perfectly. I actually prefer the layout inside the app of Netflix over that of roku and this item runs faster than I anticipated. great buy
author: Mark Pennywitt

review: This thing is wonderful.  Like a Kindle for the TV.
author: Michelle

review: After getting use to the fire stick  I like it
author: Tom

review: Better than the Chromecast because it comes with a good remote, and just as good as the Roku and costs less.
author: Patrick Gleason "Patrick"
